description.message: Follow updates of online manga readers. Beautify reading, with full chapters scans.

licence.message: All Mangas Reader is under the licence of GLPv3

options_on_websites.description: This is the header of the options page tab about reading mangas

options_general.description: This is the header of the options page tab general

options_supported.description: This is the header of the options page tab about supported websites

options_web_chapter_display_mode.description: This is the title of the options page section chapter display mode

options_web_chapter_display_chapter_desc.message: While reading a manga, display the whole chapter instead of the current page

options_web_chapter_display_mode_1.message: Scans are displayed on top of one another
options_web_chapter_display_mode_1.description: Option Chapter display mode 1 --> images are displayed on top of one another

options_web_chapter_display_mode_2.message: Scans are displayed two by two occidental reading mode
options_web_chapter_display_mode_2.description: Option Chapter display mode 2 --> images are displayed two by two occidental reading mode

options_web_chapter_display_mode_3.message: Scans are displayed two by two japanese reading mode
options_web_chapter_display_mode_3.description: Option Chapter display mode 3 --> images are displayed two by two japanese reading mode

options_web_resize_desc.message: Resize scans images to fit screen if they are to wide

options_web_loading.description: This is the title of the options page section loading

options_web_load_desc.message: See loading progression in the title bar

options_web_imgorder_desc.message: Load scans in the order of the chapter (This option involve that the chapter's loading will be slower but guarantees that the first scan which will be loaded is the first of the chapter and so on...)

options_web_prefetch_desc.message: Prefetch next chapter while reading manga. (A progress bar indicating the prefetch level of the next chapter appears inside the "Next" button)

options_web_markwhendownload_desc.message: Mark chapter as read when the full chapter has been downloaded
options_web_markwhendownload_desc.description: Option Update once fully loaded description

options_web_facilities.description: This is the title of the options page section facilities

options_web_addauto_opt.message: Automatically add manga to updates list
options_web_addauto_opt.description: Option automatically add manga to list

options_web_addauto_desc.message: Automatically add manga in my reading list when I read it. If you uncheck this option, you will have a button in the navigation bar to add the current manga in the list.
options_web_addauto_desc.description: Option automatically add manga to list description

options_web_lrkeys_opt.description: Option Use keys to read manga

options_web_lrkeys_desc.message: Use left /right keys while reading to go previous / next scan.
options_web_lrkeys_desc.description: Option Use keys to read manga description

options_web_autobm_desc.message: Automatically Bookmark scans when double click on it.

options_web_rightnext_opt.message: Next chapter when read ended (right key)
options_web_rightnext_opt.description: Option next chapter on right key

options_web_rightnext_desc.message: Right key goes to next chapter when at bottom of the page.
options_web_rightnext_desc.description: Option next chapter on right key description

options_gen_aspect.description: This is the title of the options page section customization

options_gen_newTab_opt.description: Option Open popup in new tab

options_gen_newTab_desc.message: Open my manga reading list in a new tab when i click on the All Mangas Reader's icon
options_gen_newTab_desc.description: Option Open popup in new tab description

options_gen_groupmgs_desc.message: Group mangas which have the same name on one line. When mangas are grouped, you can see all occurrences of the manga by clicking on the + icon next to the manga's name.
options_gen_groupmgs_desc.description: Option Group mangas by name description

options_gen_displastup_opt.message: Badge with last time manga had new chapter
options_gen_displastup_opt.description: Option Badge with last time updated

options_gen_displastup_desc.message: Display a badge with a calendar icon and the last time in days a new chapter has been published (badge will be removed if last chapter is more than 50 days old)
options_gen_displastup_desc.description: Option Badge with last time updated description

options_gen_dark_desc.message: Use a dark background in All Mangas Reader pages

options_gen_colors_new.message: Color of mangas with unread chapters

options_gen_colors_read.message: Color of mangas with all chapters read

options_gen_colors_notfollow.message: Color of mangas which you choose to stop following
options_gen_colors_notfollow.description: Option color of mangas not followed

options_gen_updates.description: This is the title of the options page section updates

options_gen_checkmgstart_desc.message: Update chapters list on browser startup

options_gen_refreshspin_desc.message: Spin the sharingan icon when All Mangas Reader is updating chapters list.

options_gen_savebandwidth_desc.message: Save bandwidth while loading chapter list (this options waits for one manga to be updated before updating the next one, update is slower)

options_gen_displayzero_desc.message: Display a grey "0" on AMR's icon when there is no new manga.

options_gen_nocount_desc.message: Do not display a badge with the number of unread manga but display AMR's icon in color if there are new mangas and in grey if not.
options_gen_nocount_desc.description: Option grey sharingan as icon description

options_gen_notifs.description: This is the title of the options page section notifications

options_gen_shownotifications_desc.message: Show browser notification when new chapters are found.
options_gen_shownotifications_desc.description: Option Notify on new chapter description

options_gen_notificationtimer_label.message: Time before the notification close itself
options_gen_notificationtimer_label.description: Option select time before notif closes

options_gen_notificationtimer_def.description: Option closed by user action for option select time before notif closes

options_sup_desc.message: AMR provides many supported Web Sites. You can deactivate web sites you don't use. Only web sites for which you don't have mangas in your reading list can be deactivated. You can filter the websites supporting specific language to help you. Clicking a checkbox in the table below deactivate the corresponding website.
options_sup_desc.description: Description of the supported websites tab

options_sup_repos_desc.message: Here you can define the different repositories in which All Mangas Reader will try to load mirrors implementations. AMR loads the first repository from which it can download the file websites.json correctly. If you want to help us and want to develop new implementations for a website or fix bugs in existing one, you can fork the official github mirrors repo and serve the files on your localhost (the procedure is described in the github repo). Set your local server on top of the list and refresh mirrors lists when you update something, don't forget to share your implementations !
options_sup_repos_desc.description: Options page section mirrors repositories description

options_gen_mirrornbmangas.description: Label in mirrors list to tell how many mangas are read on this mirror

options_gen_repos_input.description: Label of the new repository input field

options_gen_mirrors_header_name.message: Website name / number of mangas read
options_gen_mirrors_header_name.description: Label of the mirrors table header containing name of mirror and number of mangas read

options_gen_mirrors_header_lang.description: Label of the mirrors table header containing list of languages

options_gen_mirrors_header_act.description: Label of the mirrors table header containing activation checkbox

options_gen_mirrors_filter_all.description: Label of the option in filter languages list for no filter (display all languages)

list_sort_alpha.description: Tooltip for alphabetical sort on mangas list

list_sort_new.description: Tooltip for last new chapters sort on mangas list

list_no_manga_message.message: No manga in your list. Check the filters above or add mangas to the list. To add a manga in the reading list, just go read a manga on a site supported by All Mangas Reader. Each manga you are reading is added or updated in the All Mangas Reader reading list. You can start reading a manga by searching one using the mdi-magnify
list_no_manga_message.description: Message displayed when the reading list is empty

list_import_samples.message: Start immediately by importing a few mangas we recommend !
list_import_samples.description: Link to import samples mangas when reading list is empty

list_details_cats.description: Title of categories list in manga detail

list_details_cats_select.description: Default otion in categories list select in manga details

list_details_books.description: Title of bookmarks list in manga detail

list_details_act_search.description: Seacrh elsewhere action button in manga details

list_details_act_reset.description: Reset reading action button in manga details

list_details_act_stop_follow.description: Stop following updates action button in manga details

list_details_act_follow.description: Follow updates action button in manga details

list_calendar_today.description: Tooltip on calendar icon when last chater was found today

list_calendar_days_found.description: Tooltip on calendar icon to tell how many days since last chater found

list_progress_reading.description: Tooltip on progress bar below chapters list to tell the reading progression

list_mg_act_read.message: Mark last published chapter as read
list_mg_act_read.description: Tooltip on manga to mark as read (eye icon)

list_mg_act_prev.description: Tooltip on manga to read previous chapter

list_mg_act_cur.description: Tooltip on manga to read current chapter

list_mg_act_next.description: Tooltip on manga to read next chapter

list_mg_act_latest.description: Tooltip on manga to read last published chapter

list_mg_act_delete.description: Tooltip on manga to delete manga entry

list_mg_delete_question.message: Are you sure to delete $1 on $2 ?
list_mg_delete_question.description: Question to delete a manga, $1 is the name of the manga and $2 the website on which it is read

list_cat_include.message: Mangas from category "$1" are included in the list
list_cat_include.description: Tooltip on category when included, $1 is category name

list_cat_exclude.message: Mangas from category "$1" are excluded from the list
list_cat_exclude.description: Tooltip on category when excluded, $1 is category name

list_cat_no.message: Do not care about category "$1" to filter mangas
list_cat_no.description: Tooltip on category when not selected

list_cat_only.message: View only mangas from this category
list_cat_only.description: Tooltip on category button view only from this category

list_cat_delete_title.description: Title of the popup when deleting category, $1 is the name of the category

list_cat_delete_desc.message: This category is associated to $1 mangas. This action will remove the category from these mangas too. Are you sure to do that ?
list_cat_delete_desc.description: Description of the popup when deleting category, $1 is the number of mangas associated to the category

notif_message.message: ... has new chapter(s) on $1! Click anywhere to open the next unread chapter.
notif_message.description: Text from notification. The notification title is the manga name, $1 is the website on which the manga to notify is read

content_nav_hidebar.description: Tooltip to hide AMR bar in navigation bar

content_nav_showbar.description: Tooltip to show AMR bar when icon clicked and bar hidden

bookmark_popup_note.description: Label of the note textfield in the bookmarks popup

bookmark_popup_delete.description: Delete bookmark button in the bookmark popup in content script

bookmark_popup_tip.message:
To bookmark a scan, right click on it and choose 'Bookmark in AMR'.
To manage bookmarks, go to AMR Bookmark Page
bookmark_popup_tip.description: In bookmark popup in content script, tip on how to manage bookmarks, contains a link to AMR bookmarks page

content_nav_previous.description: Previous button in AMR toolbar in websites

content_nav_next.description: Next button in AMR toolbar in websites

content_nav_stopfollow.message: Stop following updates for this manga
content_nav_stopfollow.description: Tooltip of the stop following updates for this manga button

content_nav_follow.description: Tooltip of the follow updates for this manga button

content_nav_chapmode_1.message: Scans displayed on top of each other (click to switch display mode for this manga only)
content_nav_chapmode_1.description: Tooltip of the chapter mode button when value is 1 (Scans displayed on top of each other)

content_nav_chapmode_2.message: Scans displayed as a book in occidental mode (left to right) (click to switch display mode for this manga only)
content_nav_chapmode_2.description: Tooltip of the chapter mode button when value is 2 (Scans displayed as a book in occidental mode (left to right))

content_nav_chapmode_3.message: Scans displayed as a book in japanese mode (right to left) (click to switch display mode for this manga only)
content_nav_chapmode_3.description: Tooltip of the chapter mode button when value is 3 (Scans displayed as a book in japanese mode (right to left))

content_nav_mark_read.message: Mark this chapter as latest chapter read
content_nav_mark_read.description: Tooltip of the mark chapter as read button

content_nav_mark_read_confirm.message: This action will reset your reading state for this manga and this chapter will be considered as the latest you have read. Do you confirm this action ?
content_nav_mark_read_confirm.description: Text of the confirmation popup when marking a chapter as latest read

content_nav_add_list.message: Add this manga to your reading list
content_nav_add_list.description: Tooltip of the add manga to reading list button if not automatic

content_nav_last_chap.message: This is the latest published chapter !
content_nav_last_chap.description: Panel at bottom of page to tell that the chapter is the latest published

bookmark_chapter_text.message: Bookmark chapter '$1' of '$2' on '$3'. You can add notes below which will be associated with this bookmark.
bookmark_chapter_text.description: Text in the bookmark popup to bookmark current chapter. $1 is chapter name, $2 manga name and $3 website name

bookmark_chapter_scan.message: Bookmark scan '$1' of chapter '$2' of '$3' on '$4'. You can add notes below which will be associated with this bookmark.
bookmark_chapter_scan.description: Text in the bookmark popup to bookmark a scan. $1 is scan name/id, $2 is chapter name, $3 manga name and $4 website name

content_read_reload.description: Message displayed on a scan if it failed to be loaded so the user can try to force its reload
